ygData.subject: RE: Staff Segments - E. Karanas and Hpk
ygData.msgSnippet: I need more info in this quest.  I have the 2 staff segment but I do not know what to do with them now.  Any help would be appreciated. Rinne Than Rathe ...
ygData.messageBody:
I need more info in this quest. I have the 2 staff segment but I do not
know what to do with them now. Any help would be appreciated.

Rinne
Than Rathe

-----Original Message-----
From: Crystal Jeffreys-O'Lyne [mailto:cobaltwolf@...]
Sent: Friday, July 30, 1999 3:32 AM
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Quest] Staff Segments - E. Karanas and Hpk


From: Crystal Jeffreys-O'Lyne <cobaltwolf@...>

In E. Karanas there is a named bandit that you can kill, he drops a
staff segment and a hpk bank key. Upon turning in the key you recieve
another staff segment. Does anyone know what you do with these items.

Thanks
